Posts.Content: I too am experiencing pain in my joints and my oncologist also told me to take a baby aspirin daily!!!!I live in Connecticut on my Dr is iin Norwalk. I also have started taking a vitamin Glucosamine with the premisssion of my DR. to see if that will help the pain. My fingers and toes are the worst and I am trying to hang in there!! I was dx in July03 Invasive ductal stage 2. I have been doing well until I started with Aromasin. Let me know how you are doing Michelle
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin
